firstSection.title: Welcome to Prime X Ladies' Gym
firstSection.subTitle: A comprehensive fitness and lifestyle center designed just for you. Start your journey with a wide range of services under one roof.

secondSection.title: Our Mission
secondSection.subTitle: Helping women advance through our fitness, health, and wellness programs, supporting each member to achieve their best.

thirdSection.title: Our Vision
thirdSection.subTitle: To be the leading fitness and health center for women in Saudi Arabia, the place where women go to train, recover, and enjoy.

fourthSection.title: Why Us?
fourthSection.subTitle: Because we care about your health and comfort through our values
